TEXT.TITLE: BUNDESBANK WILL NOT HOLD PRESS CONFERENCE TOMORROW
TEXT.BODY: The Bundesbank will not hold a press conference after its regular fortnightly council meeting tomorrow, a spokesman said in answer to enquiries. Bundesbank vice-president Helmut Schlesinger will chair the meeting, as president Karl Otto Poehl has a private engagement. The next meeting is scheduled for April 16. REUTER
